ygData.subject: RE: Frustration Story (OT - Long)
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow, sounds like it was a bad nite.  I actually didn t die, but I came close to dying three times.  It was the first time I have used my squad ring more than
ygData.messageBody:
Wow, sounds like it was a bad nite. I actually didn't die, but I came close
to dying three times. It was the first time I have used my squad ring more
than once in a playing session. The first time I had zoned into RunnyEye,
to be greeted, and stunned by two dazed goblin guards. I clicked my ring
for a heal and still only got out with only 5hp left. Then as I returned
back from Rivervale I got into a disagreement when Broon decided I couldn't
cross the bridge in East Karana. Used my ring and was down to 13hp's when I
hit the shortcut under the bridge after falling off the bridge while
stunned. ran back to Rivervale, recharged ring and headed for Qeynos the
third time. Running across Qeynos hills, I was jumped by Crumpy Irontoe?
Never seen or heard of him before. He was beating me up pretty good thanks
to the help of a rabid grizzly. Used the ring a third time and still only
had 9 hps after finishing off Crumpy. That was one tough dwarf for only
having a rusty hammer on him. Does he have any quest related purpose anyone
out there has heard wind of?

Kitasi


-----Original Message-----
From: John Kim [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Monday, August 23, 1999 10:36 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Frustration Story (OT - Long)


From: John Kim <kim@...>

Damn, was last night everyone's night to die multiple times?
I had my first triple-death night since I was trying to help
someone find and retrieve their corpse in Runnyeye 5 levels
ago. Barely held onto 32. I made the mistake of running back
to Cazic without a flute, and ended up stuck at the zone with
a train on one side and a bouncer on the other. Sometimes
having a fast computer that zones quickly is not a good
thing...

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
